summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no explicit mention of Donovan L. Gay. The documents primarily concern payroll records and related administrative matters for various staff members of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). These records include payroll certifications, payroll authorization forms, final determination notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board, and other employment-related documents. The documents focus on details such as employee names, social security numbers (often postponed from release), annual salaries, gross pay, employment history, salary adjustments, and termination dates for HSCA staff members.
